title: Follow live: Knicks head to Boston for Game 1 of East semifinals
Islanders win lottery for first time since 2009
description: The New York Islanders won the NHL draft lottery on Monday and vaulted nine teams -- including the last-place San Jose Sharks -- in winning the opportunity to have the No. 1 pick, marking the first time the franchise will have that position since 2009.

title: Angel Reese credits Kim Mulkey for WNBA success following time with LSU women's basketball
description: Angel Reese is one of several legends produced by Kim Mulkey. The former LSU star dished on Mulkey's impact as she enters year two in the WNBA.

title: Arsenal must 'stick together' in PSG showdown: Odegaard
description: Martin Odegaard has urged Arsenal to "stick together" after their recent failures as they aim to defy the odds in Wednesday's decisive Champions League semi-final showdown with Paris Saint-Germain."We're disappointed now, but we have to move on and be strong and stick together and prepare for a massive game," Odegaard said.

title: Trailblazer Zhao set to take snooker to 'another level' in China
description: How Zhao Xintong's historic World Championship win will be greeted in China - and what it could mean for snooker.

title: Two riders die in British Supersport Championship race
description: Two riders die from injuries sustained in an 11-bike crash during the British Supersport Championship race at Oulton Park, Motorsport Vision Racing confirms.

title: 'Max ruined his own race' - Norris hits out at Verstappen after Miami clashes
description: Lando Norris says Max Verstappen "ruined his own race" as he hit out at the reigning world champion after their feisty battle at the Miami Grand Prix.

title: 'Don't be so sensitive!' Hamilton tells Ferrari boss after radio dispute
description: Lewis Hamilton has revealed he told Ferrari boss Fred Vasseur not to "be so sensitive" following a radio dispute between driver and team during the Miami Grand Prix.
